definition: the act of scattering, cause to separate
details:
noun
- the act of scattering
= synonyms: scattering, strewing
- a haphazard distribution in all directions
= synonyms: spread
verb
- cause to separate
= synonyms: break up, disperse
- distribute loosely
= example: distribute loosely
= synonyms: sprinkle
- sow by scattering
= example: sow by scattering
- move away from each other
= synonyms: disperse, dissipate, spread out
- to cause to separate and go in different directions
= example: to cause to separate and go in different directions
= synonyms: break up, disperse, dissipate, dispel
- strew or distribute over an area
= synonyms: spread, spread out
